name: Void Dementia
storyline:
The god of the world has fallen and is divided. When the unknown division and chaos of the world continue, the main character, Cecil, wakes up. Losing all her memories, she faces the approaching Void.

We don't know why she's here or what she did here unless her memories come back. You have to find her memory and find out who she is and what this place is like.

She is a weapon master with high proficiency in three types of weapons: katana, dual blade, and great swordshe is the best swordsman who can freely change weapons against enemies.

In the void area, she is in danger every momentBut she is immortal. Recover memories from death, learn skills, and battle enemies.
summary: Void -Dementia- is a rogue-like action game that takes place in a void zone. The game features stylish fast action and hardcore production and difficulty. It is an action game that will amplify the user's sense of challenge and immersion in the game with the story and roguelike elements of the voice area.
